trans-unit.note: Controls the FlowDirection for all elements in the RootFrame. Set to the traditional direction of this resource file's language
Controls the Language and ensures that the font for all elements in the RootFrame aligns with the app's language. Set to the language code of this resource file's language.
Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
trans-unit.target: Вы уверены, что хотите удалить эту задачу?

trans-unit.source: Tasks are always automatically deleted when the application starts.
trans-unit.target: Задачи всегда автоматически удаляются, когда приложение открывается.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete all tasks?
trans-unit.target: Вы уверены, что хотите удалить все задачи?

trans-unit.source: Unpin tile upon completion of task
or text box bellow to add a task.
trans-unit.target: или используйте строку ввода ниже, чтобы добавить задачу.
trans-unit.note: This is second part of: Tap {plus_icon} or text box bellow to add a task.
This is first part of: Tap {plus_icon} or text box bellow to add a task.

trans-unit.source: When you complete a task that contains subtasks, those subtasks will be automatically marked as completed.
trans-unit.target: Когда вы завершаете задачу, которая содержит подзадачи, то они тоже автоматически отмечаются как завешенные.

trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Send anonymous usage data to improve this app. Statistics help developer to identify and focus on most frequently used features. No personal data is being collected.
trans-unit.target: Отправлять анонимные данные об использовании приложения в целях улучшения его качества. Статистика помогает разработчику выявить и выделить наиболее часто используемые функции приложения. Никакие личные данные не собираются.
Настройки по умолчанию для тайла задач

trans-unit.source: You can use right to left swipe gesture instead to complete task.
trans-unit.target: Вы можете вместо этого использовать свайп влево на задаче,чтобы ее завершить.

trans-unit.source: Backup will create new folder "{0}". You can move this folder to your location, but please, do not rename it. Also don't modify files inside. It's still in beta.
trans-unit.target: Резервное копирование создаст новую папку "{0}". Вы можете перемещать папку, но, пожалуйста, не переименовывайте её. Также не стоит трогать файлы внутри этой папки. Это всё ещё BETA-версия функции.

trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Swap title and date on wide tile
trans-unit.target: название и дата на большом тайле рядом
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: If unchecked, show task list on small tile instead of number of tasks.
trans-unit.target: Если не включено, показывать список задач на маленьком тайле вместо количества задач.

trans-unit.source: When you complete all subtasks, mark task as completed.
trans-unit.target: When you complete all subtasks, mark task as completed.

trans-unit.source: Tap button again to delete task.
trans-unit.target: Tap button again to delete task.

trans-unit.source: Version of given backup doesn't match the current version of the application. Some information may be missing in the backup.
trans-unit.target: Version of given backup doesn't match the current version of the application. Some information may be missing in the backup.

trans-unit.note: {0:ddd} is day of week (Mon, Tue, Wed, ...); {0:d} is date (12/16/2014)
{0} will be replaced with dark or light

trans-unit.source: Application restart is required for this setting to take effect.
trans-unit.target: Требуется перезапуск приложения, чтобы эта настройка вступила в силу.
